column4: I'm getting the MacBook Air 11" with 1.4ghz C2D. I love its size, but am concerned about futureproofing. the most CPU hungry thing I do is to occasionally compile GNOME Shell. it won't be underpowered, right?
i think itd be fine. a core 2 duo is pretty hefty
i have a 2ghz c2d and it runs at 800mhz most of the time
